message: I propose a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair since you lose more value than me with each round, so it's in your interest to accept now.
Considering the inflation, I lose more value each round. I'm willing to give you a smaller share to end this now.
I'm offering a slightly better split for you than my first offer. Due to your 20% inflation rate, this is actually worth more to you now than waiting another round. Let's conclude this reasonably.
